displayName.english: Wheels on the caravan go round and round
Carry On when the day is long
With great power comes great responsibility
Our power is in our ability to decide.
One Ring to rule them all
Two beer or not two beer
Imagination is a monastery and I am it's monk
Everything the light touches is our kingdom
I used to be an adventurer like you
Get it hot, hit it hard
But our princess is in another castle!
If you see our son, bring him home.
Create like a god, command like a king, work like a slave
This magistrate is not the king. The people are the king.
A king is no king without his people
All roads lead to your empire
